DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Males female age > =18 year ( Japan : Age > =20 year time signing Informed Consent Form ) histologically confirm metastatic colorectal cancer ( mCRC ) . Metastatic disease amenable surgical curative treatment eligible receive therapy mFOLFOX6 ( Leucovorin/5Fluorouracil/Oxaliplatin ) + bevacizumab . At least one measurable lesion accord Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) 1.1 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status ( PS ) 0 1 . Adequate hepatic , renal bone marrow function . Further inclusion criterion apply .
